actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to declare costs incurred in the rehabilitation of Conconully Dam nonreimbursable and nonreturnable.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to declare nonreimbursable and nonreturnable costs incurred before enactment of this Act for emergency repairs and modifications to preserve the safety of Conconully Dam, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to declare costs incurred in the rehabilitation of Conconully Dam nonreimbursable and nonreturnable.
